task: Show the rating of Prometheus movie on IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes.
Show the rating of Prometheus movie on IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes.
user_action_and_explanation: type "Prometheus movie rating site:imdb.com" into the search box to find its rating on IMDb.
observation: The Google search results show that the movie 'Prometheus (2012)' has a rating of 7/10 on IMDb based on approximately 669,897 user ratings.

task: Show the rating of Prometheus movie on IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes.
user_action_and_explanation: type "Prometheus movie rating site:rottentomatoes.com" into the search box to find its rating on Rotten Tomatoes. This action is optimal because we need to gather the rating from Rotten Tomatoes to complete the task, and using the search functionality with site-specific query helps narrow down relevant results quickly.
observation: The Google search results show that the movie 'Prometheus (2012)' has a critic rating of 73% on Rotten Tomatoes.

task: Show the rating of Prometheus movie on IMDb and Rotten Tomatoes.
observation: The most recent observation reveals that the movie 'Prometheus (2012)' has a critic rating of 73% on Rotten Tomatoes, as observed from the search results. Additionally, earlier results indicated that the film has a rating of 7/10 on IMDb, based on approximately 669,897 user ratings. The screenshots supplement these findings, showing the Rotten Tomatoes results with the same 73% rating highlighted in user queries. This summary reflects only the latest observations.
